aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description: Hello, I am 26 years old and have been working in web programming for about three years. Currently, I reside in Iran, where I serve as a training manager and senior developer at my company. I hold a bachelor's degree from QIAU University. Before transitioning to programming, I worked in content creation and developed a strong interest in automotive mechanics. These experiences have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills, which are essential in my role as a developer. My technical expertise includes proficiencyin multiple programming languages, frameworks, and tools that enhance my development capabilities. In addition to software development, I enjoy sharing knowledge with others and mentoring new programmers during training sessions. My soft skills-such as creative thinking, problem-solving, teamwork, leadership, and ideation-enable me to communicate and collaborate effectively with my team. As an introverted individual, I thrive in collaborative environments and take pleasure in devising creative solutions while fostering a positive and supportive atmosphere. Overall, my blend of technical expertise and interpersonal skills allows me to excel in both development and training roles.

list.title: Karjoo+ Landing
list.description: Karjoo.plus is a comprehensive platform for human resource management,featuring an exhibition calendar, a list of job fairs, and detailed pages for each exhibition. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, it offers a seamless user experience and responsive design.

list.title: Photography Website
list.description: Website photography specializing in capturing precious moments for families, newborns, first birthdays, pregnancies, and other significant occasions. The site features a blog, inspiration, and stories to help families create lasting memories through photography.

list.title: Rojhani Web Store
list.description: The Rojhani website is a reputable online store. Known for offering high-quality and diverse products from trusted local, it has become a popular  destination for fashion in Iran. With a user-friendly design, secure payment options, and fast delivery,

list.title: Light karjoo Plus System
list.description: Recruitment and Recruitment Management Made Easy Register job advertisements and manage information on  cooperation requests and submitted resumes in just 4 easy steps

list.title: Exhibition Web App
list.description: The exhibitions web app provides real-time access to company profiles, booth locations, navigation routes, and job listings, enhancing the event experience and facilitating direct connections between job seekers and employers. The app can be modified to suit each exhibition.

list.title: Resume Template
list.description: Resume template app utilizes a simple user interface to help you easily create professional and stylish resumes. With customizable sections, pre-designed templates, and helpful guidance, you can personalize your resume.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.description: Do you have a personal or business idea or brand to develop and need help? Then reach out; I would love to hear about your project and help.

TeachingExperience.title: Teaching & Mentoring Experience
TeachingExperience.description: Led comprehensive web development training programs for +30 students, focusing on modern frontend technologies and practical project-based learning.
key_achievements: Developed and implemented curriculum covering React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS
Mentored students in building 15+ real-world projects with API integration
Improved students' coding efficiency by 40% through personalized coaching
Conducted weekly code reviews and debugging sessions

additionalactivities.title: AdditionalActivities
additionalactivities.workshops: Conducted +5 workshops on advanced React patterns and performance optimization
additionalactivities.open_source: Contributed to educational open-source projects on GitHub
additionalactivities.materials: Developed 30+ code examples and learning resources

list.description: Leading the technical teams to develop and enhance KARJOO's products and services.
Designed and developed a WordPress-based platform to showcase photography services.
Developed a management dashboard for clinics, including patient, service, and schedule management.
